interface.name: portmap_domtrans_helper
interface.summary: Execute portmap_helper in the helper domain.

interface.name: portmap_run_helper
interface.summary: Execute portmap helper in the helper domain, and allow the specified role the helper domain. Communicate with portmap.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the portmap domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the portmap domain to use.

interface.name: portmap_udp_send
interface.summary: Send UDP network traffic to portmap. (Deprecated)

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: portmap_udp_chat
interface.summary: Send and receive UDP network traffic from portmap. (Deprecated)

interface.name: portmap_tcp_connect
interface.summary: Connect to portmap over a TCP socket (Deprecated)

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.
